category: news
title: "With A Sight, Sound And Radar Picture, Saildrone Could Build An AI Database Of Everything In The Ocean"
excerpt: "The autonomous unmanned surface vessels (USVs) which California-based Saildrone is pitching to the U.S. Navy and Coast Guard are comparatively slow on the water but their languorous pace, low hulls and tall sails could allow them to stealthily spot everything from submarines to endangered seabirds."
